item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (1199 points | 764 comments)

29. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (643 points | 394 comments)
